name: Ultimate Bobob: The Game
description:
Click on the Attack button when it is charged to attack your enemy. Different enemies attack at different intervals, so take that into account when fighting! Good luck!

This game is based off of my movies Bobob, Bobob 2, Bobob 3, Bobob 4, and a loose recreation of the unreleased movie, Bobob's Arizona Vacation (Bobob 76)!
